name: Create Reminder
description: Create a reminder that will fire at a specific date and time. Includes title, reminder time, priority, and category.
author: AI Stack

remind_at.description: When to fire the reminder in ISO format (e.g., 2025-11-22T09:00:00Z)

priority.description: Priority level: low, medium, or high (default: medium)

examples.prompt: Remind me to take my medication at 9 AM tomorrow
Set a reminder for the team meeting at 2 PM today
Remind me to call mom this evening at 7 PM
